---
title: "ELEC & GAS Tariff"
format: html
---

Here are reported the electricity and gas tariff for Switzerland between 09-2023 for electricity and 01-2019 and 02-2023 for gas and 01-2017.

```{python}

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data_elec = pd.read_csv("ogd106_preise_strom_boerse.csv")
data_gas = pd.read_csv("ogd106_preise_gas_boerse.csv")

plt.scatter(data_elec["Datum"], data_elec["Baseload_EUR_MWh"])
plt.xlabel("Datum")
plt.ylabel("Baseload_EUR_MWh")
plt.title("Scatter Plot of Baseload_EUR_MWh between 01-2017 and 09-2023")

plt.scatter(data_gas["Datum"], data_gas["Preis_Boerse_indexiert"])
plt.xlabel("Datum")
plt.ylabel("Baseload_EUR_MWh")
plt.title("Scatter Plot of Preis_Boerse_indexiert between 01-2019 and 02-2023")

```
